section.title: About Me
section.text: Hi there! My name is Catherine Sidar CALI. I am currently a second-year computer engineering student in a work-study program, and I'm building this portfolio as part of my semantic web project to showcase my technical skills. I am currently working at the Ministry of the Armed Forces as a data engineer. I have many different interests – I love reading, hiking, nature, flowers, running, and I'm a big Swiftie. I also enjoy creating fun little projects.
